channel.title: Liam Neeson on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Liam Neeson on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Stormtrooper Helmet From ‘Star Wars: A New Hope’ Sells for $256K at Auction
item.description: Other props from the franchise, including lightsabers wielded by Ewan McGregor (Obi-Wan Kenobi), Liam Neeson (Qui-Gon Jinn) and Ray Park (Darth Maul), also were sold.
